title: The Crucifixion
verses: As on the cross the Savior hung, And wept, and bled, and died. He poured sal-va-tion
on a wretch That languished at his side.

'Jesus thou Son and heir of heaven,
'Thou spotless Lamb of God,
'I see thee bathed in sweat and tears,
'And weltering in thy blood.

'Yet quickly from these scenes of wo,
'In triumph thou shalt rise,
'Burst through the gloomy shades of death,
'And shine above the skies.'

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Retells the story of the penitent thief at the crucifixion
